name: Slime It
description:
I'm good friend for your cat.

This game for Autumn Lisp Game Jame 2018.

Press space and dive into the story. Move platform with A and D keys.

English and Russian localization.

Art by Elena Solodkaya

Music by  Jason Shaw https://audionautix.com/

Code and design by Elena Voloshina

Localization by Timur Izhbulatov and Oleg Fursenko

Mentor Code - Pavel Korolev

https://github.com/ishtarborisovna/slimeit
